msbt.message: Have you ever borrowed something from someone and held onto it for just a little too long? Well, it's embarrassing, but I've held onto an item that belongs to for ages.
Want me to return it?
You could apologize.
You know, was over at my place recently, and left a small item behind I'm not sure even knows it's missing, and it's been a little while now, to be honest.
I could return it!
Cool story.

This is unbelievable. I just received a package that's addressed to instead of me. The post office is not exempt from providing excellent customer service, if you ask me! I'll suppose I'll have to deliver this one myself
I can do it!
Sorry to hear that.

Would you really do that for me? Oh, that would be such a help.Of course, I'll still need to go apologize in person, and perhaps send a card too. No one outdoes when it comes to manners. Just let them try.
Oh, would you really? That would be wonderfully helpful.I hate to think of poor wondering where item went. Well, here you go! Thanks again.
Are you sure you wouldn't mind? Well, if you insist! Here is the package to be delivered.
Yes, I suppose that's probably best, even though it makes me look a bit foolish. Thanks for nudging me to do the right thing, .
Well, thank youI suppose. I guess I'll just go return it myself.
Ooh! I feel like you're not sufficiently outraged! I'm sure would be! Well. I suppose I'll have to take matters into my own hands and deliver it myself.

Say, do you have a minute?I was doing a little shopping the other day, and I found something that's just PERFECT. Oh, not for me, darling. For !The only thing isit's a bit gauche to just give it to out of the blue. Sowould you do it for me?
Leave it to me.
Sorry, I can't.

Oh, ! Thank goodness. You've got to help me!It seems and I have had a falling out.I don't even know why! Apparently I said something "incredibly cruel," but I don't know what it was! I want to make up, so I got a little gift for . ButI'm too nervous to do it in person right now. Is there any chance you could deliver it for me? I would be forever in your debt
I'd be happy to help.
You have to do this.
That's my ! I knew I could count on you. Well then, here you go!
Oh, thank you so much. I'm sorry to burden you with this, but, well here it is.
Oh. Well, I suppose I'll have to make some other arrangement, then. Thanks anyway
Oh. OK. WellNo, you're right. I'm the one who started the whole thing, so I should chin up and handle it. Thank you, .
Right, then. Can you get this delivered by the end of the day?
I suppose it's a little late today, so tomorrow will have to do. I assume that will be manageable.
I wonder if is wondering about that item I borrowed right nowOh, well. There's no use speculating. Thanks again for helping me out!
I wonder if is wondering about lost itemI suppose you'd better deliver it ASAP just in case!
I bet is wondering why hasn't received package yet. Would you mind terribly making it a rush delivery?
Now, try to play it cool when you deliver the gift, alright? I do hope likes it
I'm sure is just sitting there, mad at me. Please deliver that apology gift soon!
